content.question: At time <math><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVCI8FfYJH8YrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbb a9q8WqFfeaY=biLkVcLq=JHqpepeea0=as0Fb9pgeaYRXxe9vr0=vr 0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaaaape GaamiDaiabgwMiZkaabccacaaIWaaaaa@3A27@</annotation></semantics></math> , a particle moving in the xy-plane has velocity vector given by <math><semantics><mrow><mi>v</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>〈</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>〉</mo></mrow></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG2bGaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0ZaaaWaa8aabaWdbiaa iodacaGGSaGaaGOma8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacqGHsislcaWG0bWdam aaCaaameqabaWdbiaaikdaaaaaaaGccaGLPmIaayPkJaaaaa@41C2@</annotation></semantics></math> . If the particle is at the point <math><semantics><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaqadaWdaeaapeGaaGymaiaacYcadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWd aeaapeGaaGOmaaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3AEA@</annotation></semantics></math> at time <math><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVCI8FfYJH8YrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbb a9q8WqFfeaY=biLkVcLq=JHqpepeea0=as0Fb9pgeaYRXxe9vr0=vr 0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaaaape GaamiDaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIWaaaaa@3967@</annotation></semantics></math> , how far is the particle from the origin at time <math><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVCI8FfYJH8YrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbb a9q8WqFfeaY=biLkVcLq=JHqpepeea0=as0Fb9pgeaYRXxe9vr0=vr 0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaaaape GaamiDaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIXaaaaa@3968@</annotation></semantics></math> ?
